Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.rawText

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.rawText 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff
    A package for converting to and from CoNLL-X to standoff format, for interaction with annoation tools requiring this format.
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser), evaluation ( ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.rawText
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators
    Sentence annotators add annotations to the sentence after the raw text has been processed and broken up into individual sentences.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.patterns
    A package for the pattern based tokeniser, which applies supervised machine learning to certain patterns in the text representing ambiguous tokenisation decisions.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane 
    Class and Description
    RawTextAnnotator
    An annotator for a block of raw text.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane.extensions.standoff 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane.output 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane.rawText 
    Class and Description
    MatchTooLargeException
    Thrown when a regex annotator match is bigger than the rolling block size.
    RawTextAnnotator
    An annotator for a block of raw text.
    RawTextMarker
    A marker added in an annotation by a TextMarkerFilter.
    RawTextMarkType
    An action to take by a particular TextMarkerFilter.
    These actions are either stack based or unary.
    Stack-based markers can be nested.
    If unary markers (e.g.
    RawTextProcessor
    A class capable of processing a set of RawTextFilters so that a list of sentences can be extracted.
    RawTextRegexAnnotator
    For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.
    RollingTextBlock
    A block of raw text, always containing four sub-blocks, which are rolled in from right to left.
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.rawText used by com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators

    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
